title: ´We don´t have to throw everything in the trash´ – Ancelotti bullish after Clasico humiliation
description: Carlo Ancelotti said Real Madrid will not “throw everything in the trash” despite losing the first Clasico of the season 4-0 to a rampant Barcelona side at the Santiago Bernabeu. title: Hurzeler: Lack of professionalism cost Brighton in Wolves draw
description: Brighton boss Fabian Hurzeler accused his team of a lack of professionalism after they squandered a 2-0 lead with two minutes of the 90 remaining versus Wolves.
